The '''Thistledell''' was a valley that thistles grew in eastwards beyond the [[Trout Bend]] and lay between the [[Rhovanion Hills]] and the northern parts of the [[Mordor|Southlands]]. The Thistledell was invented for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' by [[Amazon Studios]].

== History ==
In the late [[Second Age]], the Thistledell was a valley that a certain [[Harfoots|Harfoot community]] passed through when migrating from one seasonal haven to the next, particularly from the [[Norfield Glen]] to the [[Grove]].

During one such migration, the Brandyfoot family, [[Poppy Proudfellow]], and [[The Stranger]] passed through the Thistledell while following in their haste after the main caravan of the Harfoot community which was far ahead of them.

Later, a group of three [[Mystics]] possibly passed through the Thistledell when they were stalking the Harfoot migration trail, seeking to find the Stranger.
